did.unittitle: George L. Birch certificate of appointment
did.abstract: George L. Birch certificate of appointment to the position of Postmaster of Brooklyn, New York, dated 1822. George L. Birch (1787-1864) was the founder of the Long Island Patriot newspaper, a Brooklyn politician, and Postmaster of Brooklyn from 1821 to 1825.
